Screen shots:

commit.message: Change text for Select All/UnSelect concepts

nodes.bodyText: opt nit: pull out these state variables into locals as well?

I'm confused by this. At this point in the code is there some kind of guarantee that the user has selected everything being displayed on the page? If selectAll is false, why do we assume they have selected ROWS_TO_DISPLAY concepts.
The word "all" here does not seem like it should be included in the case where they haven't selected everything.

commit.message: remove banner if user deselects concepts
